 From here 
 
 

 It is also a lie. Even doctors from the National Right to Life Committee admit a fetus can feel no pain. The film was taken in slow motion just before the abortion scene to produce a tranquil effect, then speeded up. This makes it look like the fetus is thrashing around "in pain." The audience is not told about the manipulation of film speed. 
 
 By any standard, deception plus persuasion equals propaganda

 
 From here 
 
 

 A scream denotes a loud sound made by expelling air from the lungs. At the age suction curettage is performed, the embryo has no lungs, nor autonomic respiratory function. And you expect it to scream? Do you know how ridiculous that is?
 [snip]
 The `screaming open mouth' indicated was actually the space between the fetal head and its chest.
 [snip]
 In addition, Silent Scream shows a large, developed fetus not the 12 week fetus that is claimed. 
 Doctors from the National Right to Life Committee admit a fetus of the age portrayed can feel no pain

That's really the crux of the problem. When is the fetus viable?
Depends upon the fetus and the medical facilities available. With the very latest in medical care, upto 10% will survive to 1 year of those born at 22 weeks. Below 22 weeks it is < 1% and effectively 0% in most cases. This figure then rises dramatically to up to 40% for 23 weeks, upto 70% at 24 weeks etc. Of those that are born on or before week 24, 50%+ will have severe chronic disablities, mainly associated with the brain and lungs.
 
 
Who gets to make the decision to murder that emerging life?
Please keep on topic. The topic is about legal abortions, not murder.

What is wrong in your mind that makes you think that murdering unborn children is a healthy activity?

Abortion is flat wrong. That is it in a nut-shell.

 You would counter this with the Bible, obviously, citing certain passages as support for a Lord of Absolute Morality. I would like to take this opportunity to point out that the bible is simply a book, written by men, with very little objective historical support. Clearly, you believe that this is enough to base your decisions on.
 
 Given that this is all that is required, I have written a book, which contains loose links to historical facts. In this book I have written that my God spoke to me and said Abortion is okay.
